summary: "Emily in Paris" is an American-French romantic comedy-drama series with Lily Collins as the main character, Emily Cooper. Emily is an American marketing executive who moves to Paris to work for a French firm. The show follows her as she navigates work, love, and friendships in the City of Love. Filmed in and around Paris, the series has received mixed reviews, with some critics arguing it stereotypes Parisians and the French. Despite this, it has been a popular show on Netflix, with multiple seasons released and more planned.
title: Emily in Paris
